com.xm.ui.widget

接口 HorizontalListViewXmeye.OnScrollStateChangedListener

  • 封闭类:
    HorizontalListViewXmeye

    public static interface HorizontalListViewXmeye.OnScrollStateChangedListener
    Interface definition for a callback to be invoked when the view scroll state has changed.

    • 嵌套类概要

      嵌套类 
      限定符和类型 接口和说明
      static class  HorizontalListViewXmeye.OnScrollStateChangedListener.ScrollState 

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void onScrollStateChanged(HorizontalListViewXmeye.OnScrollStateChangedListener.ScrollState scrollState)
      Callback method to be invoked when the scroll state changes.

    • 方法详细资料

      • onScrollStateChanged

        void onScrollStateChanged(HorizontalListViewXmeye.OnScrollStateChangedListener.ScrollState scrollState)
        Callback method to be invoked when the scroll state changes.
        参数:
        scrollState - The current scroll state.
